list.abs: achenes narrow and long obconical , 1-seeded , base usually a tuft of villous hairs , apex with persistent style ;瘦果狭窄，长倒锥状，具有1种子，通常基部有一簇长柔毛，先端有宿存花柱；

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from modern Latin achaenium, derived irregularly from a- 'not' + Greek khainein 'to gape'

means.word_mean: 1. small dry indehiscent fruit with the seed distinct from the fruit wall
